title: Design and Operation of MOOC-Based Science Project-Based Learning Programs

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Learners Perform Science Projects Linked to Daily Life, with Emphasis on Collaboration and Knowledge Sharing via Online Platforms. Requires Providing Personalized Feedback Utilizing Learners' Diverse Experiences

learning_goals: Learners can independently plan and execute science project topics using a MOOC platform.
Learners enhance problem-solving skills through online collaboration with peers and instructors during the PBL process.
Learners can collect and analyze scientific experiment data using digital tools and visually represent the results.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
